thread.title: The NRA Tried to Use a â€˜Parks and Recreationâ€™ Clip and Amy Poehler Is Not Amused

author: Natasha Bach
title: The NRA Tried to Use a â€˜Parks and Recreationâ€™ Clip and Amy Poehler Is Not Amused
text:
The NRA may not have known what it was in for after agreeing to participate in CNNâ€™s town hall Wednesday.
The town hall, â€œStand Up: The Students of Stoneman Douglas Demand Action,â€ brought together students, parents, and community members who were affected by last weekâ€™s school shooting, along with politicians, and the gun lobby itself.
Read: A Top Dallas Official Wants the NRA to Move Its Convention. The NRA Says No Way
After Dana Loeschâ€™s appearance at the event, the NRA thanked their spokesperson on Twitter for â€œbeing the voice of over 5 Million #NRA members,â€ attaching a GIF of Amy Poehlerâ€™s Parks and Recreation character Leslie Knope.
. @DLoesch thank you for being the voice of over 5 Million #NRA members. pic.twitter.com/WDz7vujXfM
â€” NRA (@NRA) February 22, 2018
But the people behind the show were less-than amused by the appropriation of the progressive, Hillary Clinton supporting character.
Read: Meet Al Hoffman Jr, the Republican Donor Taking a Stand Against Assault Weapons
Michael Schur, co-creator of the show, tweeted in reply: â€œHi, please take this down. I would prefer you not use a GIF from a show I worked on to promote your pro-slaughter agenda.â€
And, despite not being on Twitter herself, Poehler filtered her own message through Schur, which he included in his tweet. It read, â€œAlso, Amy isnâ€™t on twitter, but she texted me a message: â€œCan you tweet the NRA for me and tell them I said fuck off?â€
Hi, please take this down. I would prefer you not use a GIF from a show I worked on to promote your pro-slaughter agenda.
Also, Amy isn't on twitter, but she texted me a message: "Can you tweet the NRA for me and tell them I said fuck off?" https://t.co/YXSdzCdvdd
â€” Ken Tremendous (@KenTremendous) February 22, 2018
Nick Offerman, who played Leslie Knopeâ€™s colleague Ron Swanson on the show, echoed Schurâ€™s sentiments. He wrote , â€œour good-hearted show and especially our Leslie Knope represent the opposite of your pro-slaughter agenda â€“ take it down.â€ Adam Scott, who played Ben Wyatt, also chimed in .
. @NRA @DLoesch our good-hearted show and especially our Leslie Knope represent the opposite of your pro-slaughter agenda â€“ take it down and also please eat shit. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ https://t.co/Ar2YF4yoic
â€” Nick Offerman (@Nick_Offerman) February 22, 2018
Hey @nra please stay the fuck away from Leslie Knope. https://t.co/Lr2HCeN7qp
â€” Adam Scott (@mradamscott) February 22, 2018
The NRA has yet to comply with their requests.
